The MechJeb 2 is re-entry to hard, i have 5,7 G reentry when i do it myself or used old mechjeb it was usualy it was 3 G.

But i was really pleased for space plane autoland function, the space shuttle landed on runway i mean almost, it landed on runway but shuttle went of runway, but nobody was harmed and shuttle was intact.

I have one question, where is secondary landing site, the MechJeb 2 autoland have programmed "Isle landing site" where it is?
To be honest, everytime I use mechjeb to land, it crashes my ship. Into the ground.

I have one question, where is secondary landing site, the MechJeb 2 autoland have programmed "Isle landing site" where it is?

Look for the island east-south-east of KSC. There you'll find a gravel airstrip, control tower and a few hangers. (Don't forget to go EVA and explore. )
I believe it is the small airstrip on the island across the water from ksc.

To be honest, everytime I use mechjeb to land, it crashes my ship. Into the ground.

Yeah me too, I just do it manually as best I can and use the translatron the get a more detailed landing. Not very efficient though, I often run out of fuel
The mechjeb lands fine for me, if I'm using a spaceplane I just do it manually
I use MJ to get the deorbit burn done at the right moment then just cowboy it in. I'd feel guilty doing it any other way. 5.7G is a hard, but it's way below where the Apollo capsules re-entered.
